xlib_symbol.license: Part of X, a Cross-Browser Javascript Library, Distributed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
xlib_symbol.description: Perform a preorder traversal on the subtree starting at oNode and pass each Element node to fnVisit.

par.name: oNode
par.note: The Element object at which to begin traversal

par.name: fnVisit
par.note: This function will be called for each Element in the tree

par.name: oData
par.note: Object or variable to be passed to fnVisit

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Visit Function Prototype: ret = fnVisit(node, level, branch, data); node: The current Element object in the traversal. level: The current depth of the traversal. branch: The number of the current level 0 subtree. data: The oData object originally passed to xWalkEleTree. ret: 0 = stop, 1 = continue, 2 = skip subtree.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: reduced by 123 bytes with shorter parameter names

rev.author: mf
rev.note: put in it's own file for use with XC
